Module ntnu.idatt1002
Package ntnu.idatt1002.dao

Class ImageDAO

java.lang.Object
ntnu.idatt1002.dao.ImageDAO
public final class ImageDAO
extends java.lang.Object
The class ImageDAO provides static functions for handling image files for a User. All images will be stored under the 'Images' folder, and gets converted to '.png'. The methods gives and takes File objects referencing existing image files.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    ImageDAO()  

  • Method Summary

    static void add​(java.lang.String username, java.io.File image)
    Saves the given image file to the User and converts it to '.png'.
    static boolean delete​(java.io.File file)
    Delete an image file under the 'Images' folder for a User.
    static boolean delete​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String filename)
    Delete an image file under the 'Images' folder for a User.
    static boolean deleteByUser​(java.lang.String username)
    Delete all image files under a User folder.

    • ImageDAO

  • Method Details

    • add

      public static void add​(java.lang.String username, java.io.File image) throws java.io.IOException
      Saves the given image file to the User and converts it to '.png'.
      Parameters:
      username - the username variable in a User.
      image - a File referencing an existing image file.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if an error occurs. Either the user or the given file doesn't exist.

    • list

      public static java.io.File[] list​(java.lang.String username)
      Returns a File[] of all images stored in a User.
      Parameters:
      username - the username variable in a User.
      Returns:
      an array of files, or null if user doesn't exist.

    • get

      public static java.io.File get​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String filename)
      Returns a File of the given filename under a User folder.
      Parameters:
      username - the username variable in a User.
      filename - the image files name. For example 'image0.png'.
      Returns:
      a File referencing the found image file, or null if either the user or the files doesn't exist.

    • deleteByUser

      public static boolean deleteByUser​(java.lang.String username)
      Delete all image files under a User folder.
      Parameters:
      username - the username variable in a User.
      Returns:
      True if succesfull. False if some or all elements failed to delete, normally because the user doesn't exist.

    • delete

      public static boolean delete​(java.io.File file)
      Delete an image file under the 'Images' folder for a User.
      Parameters:
      file - a File object referencing the file to be deleted.
      Returns:
      True if succesfull. False if the file couldn't be deleted, normally because the file doesnt' exist.

    • delete

      public static boolean delete​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String filename)
      Delete an image file under the 'Images' folder for a User.
      Parameters:
      username - the username variable in a User.
      filename - the image files name. For example 'image0.png'.
      Returns:
      True if succesfull. False if the file couldn't be deleted, either the user or the file doesn't exist.
